SEARCH
Package lib.uilib.widgets.base

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
lib.uilib.framework.Widget
lib.uilib.widgets.base.Menu
public class Menu extends Widget
A widget that displays a menu with options. The menu is displayed as a list of options. The user can select an option from the menu.
Since:
2024-11-10
